title: Seasons
description: Local health food shop serving Exeter since 1978 and changed ownership in 2015; now proud to be a 100% vegan shop. Stocks a wide variety of foods as well household products, including a wide range of organic products, wholefoods and superfoods, plus fresh fruit and veg, chilled and frozen items, house-made baked goods, natural toiletries, eco household products and more.
